name: Purgatory (itch) (JoasB)
description:
On a boat going nowhere...
Wandering the void for an eternity...

In Purgatory, you will experience a short first person game exploring an unknown place full of mystery and atmosphere.

Controls
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Esc - Exit back to menu

Purgatory is available for Windows.
Made with Godot Engine, using the Scatter plugin.
